ref: 9581 bhŕ̊ṅgā f. ʻ large black bee ʼ AV., bhr̥ṅga -- 1 m. ʻ bee ʼ BhP., ˚aka -- m. Kathās., bhr̥ṅgī -- f. Kāv., bhr̥ṅgāṇa -- m. ʻ large black bee ʼ lex. 2. bhr̥ṅgārī -- , ˚rikā -- f. ʻ cricket ʼ lex., bhr̥ṅgālī -- ʻ bee ʼ Bhaṭṭ. 3. bhr̥ṅgarōla -- m. ʻ a kind of wasp ʼ Vās. (for ending cf. varōla -- ). [< *bhr̥m -- ga<-> (with same suffix as in pataṅ -- gá -- ) ~ bhramará -- 2 from IE. *bhrem -- ʻ buzz ʼ in Lat. fremo, &c. (bherem2 in IEW 142): cf. EWA ii 519, 529. -- Cf. *bhr̥m -- ka -- in bhaṅkārī<-> ~ bhaṅgārī -- f. ʻ gadfly ʼ lex., Pa. bhiṅka -- m. ʻ small animal ʼ, bhiṅkārī -- f. ʻ a bird ʼ]
Pk. bhiṁga -- m. ʻ bumble -- bee ʼ;
kch. lēnč ʻ bee ʼ (< *bhr̥ṅgicī -- IIFL iii 3, 111);
kch. lēnč ʻ bee ʼ (< *bhr̥ṅgicī -- IIFL iii 3, 111);
H. bhĩg, bhī˜gī m. ʻ black bumble -- bee ʼ, bhũgā, bhãgā m. ʻ wasp ʼ;
M. bhũgā m. ʻ black bee ʼ, bhĩgruṭī f. ʻ cricket ʼ;
Si. bin̆ga ʻ big black bee, wasp ʼ.
